comprehensive_overview: ncview is a visual browser for netCDF format files used for earth system data. It provides functionalities for viewing, analyzing, and interacting with data stored in netCDF files.
core_features: Visualization of data stored in netCDF format
Plotting of variables such as temperature, humidity, wind vectors, and more
Zooming, panning, and slicing through data
Customizing plots with different color maps and annotations
